actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ape makes two fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 25/50 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
